append„ n. I.

² Tot quidem tantasque offendit Societas difficultates in collegii au-
gustani institutione, ut ante annum 1580 1106 negotium 30 felicem exitum
perduci minime potuerit. Cf. AGRICOLA, Hist. Germ. snper„ D. 3, nn. 184,
2203 D. 4, n. 4073 et D. 5, 11. 26 et seqq.
